buildCommand: echo "SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL" > .env && echo "SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY" >> .env && echo "STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=$STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY" >> .env && curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.32.4-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ -C /tmp && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter build web --no-tree-shake-icons --dart-define-from-file=.env
